title: 4. Methods and Properties
content:
## Comparison

`Methods` Are actions of an object, functions procedures

`Properties` Are descriptions of an object, attribute or state




## Property

```js
let myVar = "ThisISaString"

/* Get String Length */

console.log(myVar.length)

```


## Method

```js
let myVar = "ThisISaString"

/* Transform String into Uppercase */
console.log(myVar.toUpperCase())


/* Check if String starts with H */
console.log(myVar.startsWith('T'))
```
